title: Ball detector(s) + gating
scope: Produce per-frame ball detections with confidence and conservative false-positive gating.
Prefer missing/unknown over wrong when uncertain.
acceptance: Detections output includes confidence and gating diagnostics.
Output contract template documents detection schema and semantics.

deliverables.title: Ball detections output per frame (confidence + gating diagnostics)
acceptance: Each frame emits 0..N ball detections with confidence.
Gating surfaces a reason when detections are suppressed.
evidence: A minimal pipeline run produces detections with confidence + gating diagnostics.

deliverables.title: Output contract template updated for ball detections
acceptance: Contract documents detection schema and missing/unknown semantics.
evidence: `npm run generate` renders docs reflecting the updated contract template.

subtasks.title: Define detection record schema and deterministic per-frame output.
done_when: Record fields are explicit (time/frame, bbox/pos, confidence, flags).

subtasks.title: Implement conservative gating + diagnostics.
done_when: False positives are suppressed conservatively (prefer missing over wrong).

subtasks.title: Update output contract template for ball detections.
done_when: Contract template includes schema and minimal examples.
